metadata.title: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals
metadata.subtitle: Master Microsoft 365 productivity and collaboration tools
metadata.description: Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft 365 including Office apps, Teams, SharePoint, and Exchange Online. Prepare for the MS-900 certification.

overview.summary: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals provides a comprehensive introduction to Microsoft's productivity suite. Learn how to leverage Office apps, Teams, SharePoint, and other Microsoft 365 services to enhance productivity and collaboration.
objectives: Understand Microsoft 365 core services and products
overview.targetAudience: IT professionals, administrators, and end-users who want to understand Microsoft 365 services and prepare for the MS-900 certification.

modules.title: Microsoft 365 Overview
modules.description: Introduction to Microsoft 365 services and cloud concepts

sections.content: Microsoft 365 is a complete, intelligent solution that includes Office 365, Windows 10/11, and Enterprise Mobility + Security, delivering a complete, intelligent, and secure productivity solution.

sections.title: Core Microsoft 365 Services
items: Exchange Online - Email and calendar services
SharePoint Online - Document management and collaboration
Microsoft Teams - Chat, meetings, and collaboration
OneDrive for Business - Personal cloud storage

modules.title: Office 365 Applications
modules.description: Deep dive into Office 365 productivity applications
objectives: Master Word, Excel, PowerPoint online features

sections.content:
Office Online Applications

Office Online provides web-based versions of familiar Office applications with real-time collaboration features.

sections.caption: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote Online

labs.title: Collaborative Document Editing
labs.description: Practice real-time collaboration in Office Online

instructor.name: Michael Chen
instructor.title: Microsoft 365 Certified Trainer
instructor.bio: Michael is a Microsoft Certified Trainer with extensive experience in Microsoft 365 deployment and administration. He has helped hundreds of organizations successfully adopt Microsoft 365 solutions.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator Associate

resources.title: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals Learning Path
resources.description: Official Microsoft learning path for Microsoft 365 Fundamentals

resources.title: MS-900 Practice Tests
resources.description: Official practice tests for MS-900 certification

certification.name: Microsoft 365 Certified: Fundamentals
certification.description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of Microsoft 365 cloud service offerings
skillsMeasured: Describe Microsoft 365 core services and concepts (35-40%)
Describe security, compliance, privacy, and trust in Microsoft 365 (30-35%)

faq.question: What's the difference between Microsoft 365 and Office 365?
faq.answer: Microsoft 365 includes Office 365 plus Windows 10/11 Pro licenses and advanced security features, while Office 365 focuses primarily on the productivity applications.

faq.question: Do I need a Microsoft 365 subscription for this course?
faq.answer: No, we provide trial access during the course. However, having a Microsoft 365 account will help you practice the concepts after the training.

faq.question: Is this course suitable for complete beginners?
faq.answer: Yes, this course is designed for beginners and assumes no prior knowledge of Microsoft 365 or cloud services.
